originalText.text:
When you call for an appointment you are directed to another doctor and given the option of calling back during regular business hours. However, I have called two days in a row without any response.
She was a pretty good doctor but I suppose she‚Äôs no longer in practice.

originalText.text: BEWARE, CYNTHIA IS RUNNING A SCAM. I phoned Cynthia specifically about the appointment and she told me it would cost $200, then at the appointment she raised the price to $425 and would not accept what she had previously said, conveniently 'forgetting' despite my protests. She then proceeded to give me 3 contact lenses! She also does not have an email so that these pricings and promises cannot be proven on paper. Please stay away from this scammer.

text.text: BEWARE, CYNTHIA IS RUNNING A SCAM. She then proceeded to give me 3 contact lenses! She also does not have an email so that these pricings and promises cannot be proven on paper. Please stay away from this scammer.

originalText.text: While I don't see Dr. Miller as often I should -- they're not great at appointment reminders other than the old-school postcard, which gets tossed -- she is great. Thorough, good "bedside" manner, and very knowledgeable. Highly recommend.

text.text: While I don't see Dr. Miller as often I should -- they're not great at appointment reminders other than the old-school postcard, which gets tossed -- she is great. Thorough, good "bedside" manner, and very knowledgeable. Highly recommend.

originalText.text: The best Ophthalmologist I have ever seen! (And I have seen quite a few over the years) Very patient and great "bedside" manners! I highly recommend her to anyone who needs Contact Lenses fitted. Especially someone who has never wore contact lenses and want to get them. üëçüëç
